website_summaries.verdict: Brewed iced tea with organic ingredients and pleasant flavors that will appeal to most tea drinkers.
pros: Made with tea leaves that are produced through fair trade methods
Comes in several flavors that have pleasant tea taste without being overly sweet
cons: Some repeat customers gripe that the tea in some cases had a strange flavor that wasn't typical of the brand

customer_reviews.title: There is mold in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: The expiration date says Aug 5 2019. But there is already mold in the bottle and it tastes like fermented.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Chen

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this Honest Tea Honey and Green Tea because it doesn't contain much sweetener at all. Normally, I'm a purist -- no sugar, no artificial sweeteners in my tea -- but this Honest Tea has enough honey to give the tea some complexity without seeing, well, sweet. At 70 calories per 16.9 fl. oz. bottle, it's a relatively low calorie drink with some flavor. -- Debbie Lee Wesselmann
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lee WesselmannTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color/taste
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Honest Honey Green Tea in the store, sometimes it's hard to find and I always love drinking it. So I decided to order it from Amazon and I was extremely disappointed that the stuff that was delivered had the same label but absolutely didn't look the same (amber colored rather than the light green color I've bought in stores before) and doesn't taste the same! It's got a weird honey aftertaste. Such a huge disappointment.... I will not order again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Rap

customer_reviews.title: I dislike soda and most sweet tea products
customer_reviews.text: I dislike soda and most sweet tea products, mostly I just drink water, but the Honey Green Tea is so good I've set up a regular delivery. I find most such drinks too sweet, or too chemical-tasting. This stuff is great though, I like it half frozen out of the freezer. I have not tried any of the other flavors; only the honey green tea.
customer_reviews.author: Roma Cranberry

customer_reviews.title: Mold growth in unexpired bottles
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry to say that our case of tea came with unwanted extras. Even though our tea was nowhere near its expiration date, there were half dollar size mold rings floating at the top of each bottle. Consume at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: Morrison Russell

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking the Honest Tea in the half lemonade half tea flavor for more than 3 years now consistently. I first discovered it at my local Bjs and I've been HOOKED ever since! The thing is this is the ONLY FLAVOR that I will drink. The rest of them are disgusting! This flavor is delicious and most of all it's not too sweet. The only things I drink are espresso in the mornings, water and this tea. That's really it(Not to forget the occasional glass of wine). The best part is my children don't like it because they say it tastes like water. So MORE FOR ME AND HUBBY!
customer_reviews.author: Fae8

customer_reviews.title: Just delicious. Tastes homemade and fresh.
customer_reviews.text: This is just delicious. Tastes fresh and pleasant, not chemically at all. Bought cases for my mother in Florida when the hurricanes were coming and it kept them happily caffeinated during power outages. I knew she'd prefer this to those overly sweet and fatty coffee drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Honest Tea
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this stuff. We're certainly no strangers to the Honest brand, but this in particular is one of our favorites from the brand. As we're eliminating soda from our diets, we view this as a sort of... step in the right direction. It contains FAR less sugar than your typical soda, and has a much milder flavor. That flavor, however, is exceptionally refreshing and wonderful. None of the flavors in the recipe are overpowering. Just subtle and delicious. The expiration lead times were appropriate, and the products were authentic. Looking forward to the next subscription delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not What it Used to Be
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Used to love the Peach Tea, but they recently changed the name from Peach Tea to Peach Oolong Tea and changed the ingredients as well. The previous tea was definitely a 5 star tea, this one is horrible. Tastes more like an imitation lemon flavor more than a peach flavored tea. I know they say that the ingredients are organic, but it taste like more unnatural than the old recipe. Returning all 5 cases that I ordered and will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: April Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Ever
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this my favorite tea, it is my favorite beverage overall! I have had this on auto ship for almost a year now and plan to keep it that way. This tea is so much better that ALL other brands of green tea, and this Honey blend is just the right amount of a little sugar. You do have to watch the dates on cases of tea though as sometimes Amazon will send tea that is just not as fresh...or else the manufacturer lacks quality control on its batches as it should. Some cases can be perfect while others can be a little bitter to taste.
customer_reviews.author: DebzDoodle59

customer_reviews.title: Just not tasting right to me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this tea, but ultimately the taste was not what I expect from green tea, and the calories (70) were much higher than I had thought that they would be. As far as I can tell, it was the various sweeteners that they used, not the tea itself, that led to me not liking this product. Taste is a very personal thing, but I think it is legitimate to say that this has a different taste than most green teas. You may or may not like it.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Change?
customer_reviews.text: Definitely tasted like they have changed their formula, much more watered down with barely a hint of peach flavor. Disappointed, because I liked this one- it wasn't too sweet or overpowering, but now it's barely anything.
customer_reviews.author: J_0

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The best mix of tea and lemon, not real acitic, very smooth. I lost count how many cases I have gone through now. I always have it coming to make sure u do not run out. I am a sweet tooth so the just a tad sweet is on the money for describing it. Not totally dry or bitter, as stated tad sweet but I love sweet so I just as a teaspoon of regular sugar per bottle and oh my I end up drinking the full bottle in like 5 minutes. Honestly its that good.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Performance

customer_reviews.title: A great Arnold Palmer and healthier than a soda
customer_reviews.text: I love a good Arnold Palmer and Honest Tea is my 2nd favorite one that is commercially made but it by far the healthiest. At 100 calories for a 16oz bottle you are getting plenty of sweetness at half the calorie count of the same size soda bottle. The tea is more over powering than the lemonade but still the taste of the lemon is hard to miss. I feel that the drink is best drank very cold over ice but however you choose to drink it you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Rotten cap with blood was found in the drink!
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting thing found in the drink, which makes me so sick and want to vomit. Called the honest tea immediately and was given a reference number. Someone wrote to me saying my number is not working. I called back multiple times and never heard back from Kim who is North American product acceleration team. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Leaves terrible aftertaste!
customer_reviews.text: I got this tea because The price of the pure leaf cold brew is too expensive. Well, I should absolutely know that you get what you pay for. I know better. This tea is ok, but leaves a terrible aftertaste in your mouth almost as if it were mixed with powder? The mango flavor is better and doesn’t leave the aftertaste quite as bad. I’ll make some myself in a pitcher or save up and get the kind I like. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual Gangsta Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just nasty!!
customer_reviews.text: I drink allot of iced tea!! My favorite has become a little hard during the the tyranny of covid19. Bought this on a whim and it's really nasty, had a gritty texture (iced tea shouldn't have texture anyways). Took the balance of the package to work to pawn it off during the heatwave. Coworkers all agreed it was nasty. And these guys will drink and eat anything. Try something else if I was you. Good luck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: 50 percent of your daily sugar intake in 1 bottle
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high in sugar. 50% (25g) of your daily sugar intake in 1 bottle, that equals 6 teaspoons of sugar. Bunch of gunk on the bottom of each bottle also. It does taste good, but way too much sugar to keep me as a customer. Also the honest brand is part of CocaCola, so if you want to support a company that is making the good people of our country obese then go ahead and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: dM

customer_reviews.title: 70 calories per 16.9oz, great for stubborn dieters!
customer_reviews.text: Great option for stubborn dieters. As it says on the bottle its just a tad sweet which just satisfies those cravings for a sugary drink. Like how its all natural and only 70 caluries for 16.9oz of liquid. I buy these buy the case. Only complaint is somewhat pricy per bottle would like to see a bigger discount for bulk purchases. Overall though i love this beverage!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea and delivery was very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This tea/lemonade is delicious, very lightly sweetened with real sugar. I love it. The only reason I’m not ordering it anymore, is bc we have it in Alaska now, and my mail carrier struggles to deliver the heavy box with the two cases I was ordering. It’s more expensive to buy it in AK, but, I don’t want my mail carrier to get hurt delivering my tea.
customer_reviews.author: Starquake

customer_reviews.title: Lightly sweet balance of Tea and Lemonade
customer_reviews.text: Love Honest Tea - Half Tea Half Lemonade! Hard to find in my area...run about $1.39 for the 16 oz. Not that much cheaper on Amazon, but the convenience of free shipping with prime is better than lugging a dozen bottles in and out my car. This tea is a lightly sweet balance of tea and lemonade. But, they do punch a 100 calories a bottle, so be careful not to drink all your calories away. Nice and refreshing over ice or straight out of the fridge. I like that the tea is not overly sweet!
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Tasty....but I didn't like the plastic bottles
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying honest tea for a while and it used to come in glass bottles but now the packaging seems to have changed and switched to plastic. I knocked off a star just for that and that I was able to find it cheaper elsewhere. The taste was good and it had just the amount of sweetness which isn't very much....how tea should be. The formula changed a bit compared to the previous years. The taste has a tad less tea flavor like previous years but all in all, not too bad. If I can find it cheaper, I'll probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nhan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty - little too sweet for my taste
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the Honest Tea products, and as I drink them more I find this one to be a little too sweet. The flavor and balance is excellent, and it is a good transition from Pure Leaf or another bottled tea. The green tea with honey is also excellent, and it doesn't have the "burned" tea taste some others do and is a less sweet alternative with more caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: Vidue

customer_reviews.title: Honest never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Delicious Honey Green Tea! Not too sweet -it’s just right. Better flavor than other brands with no strange aftertaste, unlike many real brewed teas that I have ordered. We enjoy it - and sometimes I add a kick of raw orange blossom honey when I do want it a little sweeter. Overall, a great iced tea. As usual with Honest products.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great line!
customer_reviews.text: Coffee gives me shortness of breath so I’ve been drinking these Honest Tea for the last few years. I think it’s amazing that amazon carries these and ships these for free! The entire line is just a tad bit sweet, unlike the other brands with strong artificial sweetener taste. Also highly recommend Honest Tea’s peach tea!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: My Aunt Peggy
customer_reviews.text: This is a delicious and natural tasting tea. Not too sweet, just right. I drank a whole jug by myself and took a selfie for Instagram, I currently have 13 followers and counting. My aunt Peggy follows me on Instagram as well. She bakes pies, I like the apple pie she makes the best.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It tastes like tea to me
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad tea. It does have a somewhat tea bag taste but again it is organic. Our family thinks it taste better than the regular all tea flavor so that is what keeps us buying it. The price is fair for the quality of the product. If the price goes up then we will stop buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lock

customer_reviews.title: New name same product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this flavor and is very happy they offer it again. Originally is was listed as pomegranate blueberry or something similar and was pulled from the market for a few months. So glad it’s back. It has a different name, rebranding? But it has the same ingredients and flavor so it’s a hit.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great green tea flavor. Slightly sweetened. A little overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Great green tea flavor. Lightly sweetened. Wish it had a little less sugar. Reordered more. I feel like they really tinkered with their recipe to provide the best product possible. Lost 1 star overall and 1 star on value. Bring the price down a little more and this is a 5* product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Crum

customer_reviews.title: Bitter Brew
customer_reviews.text: This is not like the discontinued peach tea. It is bitter and you can barely taste the peach. I was ordering 3 12-packs a month from Amazon. Honest Tea has lost my business. I'm heading over to Lipton Peach Hibiscus.
customer_reviews.author: ldmus

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Someone please tell me why Honest Tea is popular? The tea/lemonade tastes like cheap Nestea. It’s ok but I bought it expecting it to be this amazing drink people brag about. 100 Calories per bottle is also a bit over the top. I’ll stick to Bai Strawberry/lemonade.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Natural flavors...ugh. Plastic bottles...not so green Honest T
customer_reviews.text: No one adds natural organic flavoring to the iced tea with lemon they make at home. Natural flavors are the same as artificial flavors and are profitable for corporations. If you have allergies you shouldn't ingest natural/artificial (even organic) flavors. Vote with your wallet and break the addiction to these cheap fake chemical flavors that aren't healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: Best bottled Green tea I could get.
customer_reviews.text: I subscribed to this for two months, after trying a variety of bottled Green Tea's purchased locally. Taste was good but the first month the bottles had some dark matter settled in the bottom. The second month everything was fine, they had a newer production date by 4-6 months. Both months they arrived in a very timely manner and in good condition but in the end I found them on sale at a better price at Kroger and stocked up and canceled my subscription. My biggest regret about these is they are not available locally or from Amazon Prime, in the 59 oz bottle and I hate all the resulting plastic waste, even though I recycle.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: This is just terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I TRIED to GIVE it away - and everyone who tasted it said NO THANKS! This has one of the worst taste I have ever tried - or any of my friends have tried. NONE of us liked it - had to TOSS the last 6 because no one would take it! Sorry - but this needs a LOT of improvement.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: No peach flavor, lacks taste, not even “a tad sweet”
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what happened with the peach flavor tea but after you changed its name, it is nothing like the original taste. This one is not even just a bit sweet, no peach flavor at all. It is simply tea with no flavor. I can make myself such kind of tea. What is the point of saying it is peach flavored? Very disappointing! Not what I expected. I have been buying this for over 3 years and I guess this will be my last purchase. You changed something that was good and turned it into a product that will likely push people away.
customer_reviews.author: D.K

customer_reviews.title: the best.
customer_reviews.text: I can make a halfway decent half and half. also, I love half and half. it is the best summer refreshment. ("IS BEST!") but for some reason, this is just miles beyond whatever I've been able to mix up. or other brands. or restaurants. I'm not even sure how to explain what's so good about this one. I don't particularly care for basically every other flavor tea or juice that I've tried from honest tea (sorry guys). none of them are bad, the ones I've tried have all been acceptable or better. I am waiting for a delivery of their mango orange-ade from amazon with fingers crossed. but this is on a completely different level. like, several million levels above.
customer_reviews.author: Henzo Broquee

customer_reviews.title: PEACH FLAVOR IS AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: The peach flavor is the worst. Zero flavor basically tastes like drinking water, but somehow worse.
customer_reviews.author: Milan

customer_reviews.title: awesome tea
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely my favorite brand of tea. The all green tea 12 pack costs less than the variety pack which is a little weird but I do really like this tea alot, better than the overtly sweet varieties that other brands have and better than unsweetened varieties. Its just right
customer_reviews.author: mvn

customer_reviews.title: Fresh tasting green tea
customer_reviews.text: I like this tea because they use real sugar. The caffeine content is very high so just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tea, impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bottled tea, bar none, full stop. However, I have NO idea what is going on at the bottling plant, because these bottles are absolutely impossible to open. For context, we are a household of young, able-bodied people and the bottles range from 'difficult but ok' to 'I had to use a pair of channellocks.' The latter bottle was sealed so tightly that the grooves on the mouth had actually made impressions THROUGH the plastic of the cap. Seriously, do not get this if you do not want to get swole by wrenching open bottles of (delicious) tea.
customer_reviews.author: kisskicker

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brand! I love all the flavors. My favorites are the Peach Black Tea and Arnold Palmer Half/Half. Both are incredible. Honey Green Tea is great too. Can’t wait to actually try the Peach oo-la-long bottles sometime too.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best Tea Ever!! This is the one tea I splurge on! I am an avid tea drinker! This is the only bottled tea I LOVE! I am walking advertisement for this tea! It is perfectly sweet! Not cloy in the least bit!
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel and Ruby

customer_reviews.title: not as good as the glass bottle version of tea
customer_reviews.text: this product is good and better than it counter parts but still the product line that in the glass bottle is far superior to this version. but the glass bottle is not a value or safe for amazon to ship (to many bottle break.)
customer_reviews.author: nickey

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea, the honey green tea is my favorite. I just wish they didn't cap the bottles so tight - they are so hard to get off! I have a blister on my thumb because I drink one every morning LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harman

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bottled tea
customer_reviews.text: I love honest tea and this is the flavor that got me hooked..the tea isn't that sweet like the bottle says just a tad and its the closest thing to at home brewed tea that I've tried. On amazon is one of the best deals I've seen and I've never got a bad batch and i repurchase so much i should just subscribe and save. The tea does settle at the bottom but it warns that so it may not always look perfect but the taste is real and great and as long as it doesn't change too much formulation wise i will always repurchase and recommend. I've been a fan for years and glad its more widely available.
customer_reviews.author: JennT

customer_reviews.title: Huge pieces floating in bottles
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before with no issues, the latest order however is strange. The tea is VERY cloudy (more so than usual) and has LARGE dark pieces of something floating. They do not dissipate even after shaking vigorously. They are sending a replacement case, I hope it isn't the same as I'm afraid to drink these.
customer_reviews.author: nkk_lhotp

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed in this lemon tea. It tastes okay, but not as good as the Tazo lemon tea. Also, each of the bottles that I receive has black residuals on the bottom. This seems to be the case for many people based on the reviews I read. I still drank them and hasn’t got sick.
customer_reviews.author: Kin Lay

customer_reviews.title: Honest?
customer_reviews.text: I was buying at the grocery store when the price was low {$1 per bottle} but most of the time it was much more expensive than Amazon. You also do not get the variety of flavors at most grocery stores so I buy 4 flavors here at Amazon on the subscribe and save. This is the only drink I have found which has a wonderful taste without artificial lemon or loads of sugar, just right. The best one {pomegranate white tea} is not offered here nor can you find it at the grocery store anymore so I will assume they quit making it which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!! 🤢🤮 The first sip tasted funny so I thankfully didn't finish this, dumped it out to put the bottle in recycling and this smelly rubbery vomit-inducing moldy slug-like thing was at the bottom!!! I already drank the rest of the case, I might puke this is so disgusting. WHAT IS THIS?? DO NOT BUY THIS!!! Will be contacting the company, if I don't die first. GROSS. 🤢🤮
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: A great tea drink with less sugar than most.
customer_reviews.text: Honest Tea has the least amount of sugar in their drinks than almost any other drink of this type. The flavor is terrific and the price is right in the middle of what I can get locally at the store. I love this company's approach to making tea products. Brew it, bottle it and ship it. All their teas are good but this is my favorite. Green tea with peach is my second favorite.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brachman

customer_reviews.title: Each bottle perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite iced tea. Perfect amount of sweetness and just the right amount of caffeine. I usually pay between $1.69 and $2.09 per bottle, so being able to buy a case of 12 for less than $15.00 is a great savings. I checked each bottle that arrived last night and they are all in perfect condition. As far is taste is concerned: I'm on my second bottle and they are both great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Not sure when these things were bottled...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure when these were actually bottled, but on the label it says best by Nov 16th/20. The color is not how they appear in the photo, you can't see through the bottle. The flavor doesn't seem right although I am not sick from them. I wonder if these have been sitting somewhere a long time before they get shipped out. I wouldn't mind trying another flavor though, maybe I just got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Electronics Hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: This tea is the best!  Not too sweet and not too tart.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea! My favorite is the half tea and half lemonade. I am a true sweet tea drinker but prefer this tea over all. Trust me and try it! You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Arnold Palmer (half lemonade-half Iced Tea) on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and taste (like real tea and lemonade) without harsh or after-tasting sweeteners. I have this on reorder and still love it every time
customer_reviews.author: DMacNulty

customer_reviews.title: Not sweet enough
customer_reviews.text: Because of the lemon in these they really need 2 more spoonfuls of sugar in them to make them tasty. I can enjoy them then and the price is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Katwilm

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this tea for a hot day
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to carry. Taste great and would recommend this because our not so sweet tea like others. Perfect for a hot day it quenches your thirst
customer_reviews.author: vince adams

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea
customer_reviews.text: This is the best iced tea. Some settling so you need to shake it. It is not mold or anything bad. It even says needs shaken before drinking. This iced tea is so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Honest Tea is consistent and a healthy source of vitamins and energy!
customer_reviews.text: Honest tea is the only Green tea I have now after a health scare in 2018. It replaced their competitors by having low levels of sugar and excellent consistent taste. Keep it stock please!! Great flavor and always good!!
customer_reviews.author: EJV

customer_reviews.title: So Good
customer_reviews.text: I love these drinks. I always make sure I have some stocked, because I would hate to run out of them. They are one of my favorite drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Workman

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: Had to dispose of this tea. Had a very strange taste.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Never too sweet. Clean and tasty.
customer_reviews.text: Since my local grocery store has stopped carrying this specific product, Amazon has become a reliable resource to get it sent. The Honest Green Tea with Honey is a great drink without too much sweetness that is all too prevalent in drinks these days. One of the few non-water drinks I have regularly and a definite favorite. Only wish there was an even bigger case.
customer_reviews.author: Pete S.

customer_reviews.title: Not really organic
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good fit for me - but it has to have ascorbic acid in it because it irritated my stomach. I guess that can call anything organic.
customer_reviews.author: Dba Living Artists

customer_reviews.title: Convenient supply at front door.
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and low on sugar. I can get each for a buck or less when it goes on sale at Stop n Shop so it would be great if the value was a tad better here.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Great real tasting tea!
customer_reviews.text: As far as the product goes if you like a moderately sweet tea then you have found it! It doesn't have an artificial taste like some other tea's on the market seem to have and for this reason I consider this my favorite bottled tea brand. It definitely has the ability to quench my thirst and that's probably why I find it so appealing. The price does seem to fluctuate a good bit on here as stated in other reviews, but sometimes I have trouble finding the Half and Half version of Honest tea anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: JamesonMcG

customer_reviews.title: Best bottled tea I've had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bottled tea I've found. It's just what it says -- sweet without being too sweet. All the other bottled teas I've tried have had 2 to 3 times as much sugar in them. I also think honey complements the taste of green tea better than just sugar or HFCS. The tea isn't as strong as what I brew myself, but it's by far the best bottled tea I've been able to find in stores! I had to order a case to have some on hand since most stores near me don't carry it!
customer_reviews.author: Kgoss

customer_reviews.title: Def worth trying
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes so good! I highly recommend it. It’s low calorie and a good value when you buy in bulk. This is the only flavor I have tried but I look forward to trying the others.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: By far the best tasting low-sugar drink
customer_reviews.text: There are few choices in the drink industry that fit this category and help people kick the sugar habit. "Just a tad sweet" is their byline and it works for me. This product makes "unsweet" delicious and I'm seeing it in fewer stores so I had to buy it from Amazon. People - please support this company and their products or choices will narrow.
customer_reviews.author: -sb-

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: The sugar content of Honest Tea is lower than most sweetened teas. This may be good or bad, depending on your preferences.
customer_reviews.author: RRW

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: We like most of the Honest Tea products. They have less sugar, which is a big plus. They tend to be a bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: Delicious. Nutritious. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what "warmth" means in this context, but anyway.... This tea is AWESOME. I have often bought one or two bottles in a grocery store. Now Amazon brings them straight to my home! YAY
customer_reviews.author: Sadia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great, refreshing homestyle tea
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tea I have purchased that actually taste like refreshing homemade tea; I drink over it over ice with a lemon wedge and can not tell the difference between the Honest Tea and my own. The simple wholesome ingredients listed on the label reassures me that I can not only drink this myself but also give it to my family. We only rarely drink soda in our home so this gives me an additional portable drink to have on those warm summer afternoons or to take on a family outing. If you love iced tea you will love Honest Tea Green Tea, honestly!
customer_reviews.author: Dotti R Kunnap

customer_reviews.title: Fake honest green tea brewed in the garage in the middle of nowhere
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is real honest tea or fake but it look and taste different then one I was always buying from the grocery store. Bought 6 dozens and all of them are less then two months from expiration date. Bottle on the left in the picture showing original honest tea purchase in the grocery. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Pretty Good Tea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I have been getting the honest kids juice for our daughter, and I wanted to try something for the adults. This is a good tasting green tea for the most part, but it also reminds me of when you leave a green tea bag in hot water for too long and it gets a bit bitter. With the amount of sugar in this it shouldn't taste that way, at least not to me. But, I put a few drops of agave nectar in it to mask the taste and that really seems to help. I wouldn't say don't get it. Just depends on your tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Living in Glitter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, EYE love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Find myself when I am thirsty reaching "honestly" for the Honey Green Tea. Today I decided to subscribe. Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Way too much sugar content and not even sweet
customer_reviews.text: Front says just a tad sweet but if you look at back it’s 50% of your daily servings of sugar!!! Would not have got had I noticed
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: best bottled green tea not too sweet just good
customer_reviews.text: I love the tea. Sometimes I do have trouble getting the bottles open. Not sure if it is the wide top or just the good vacuum seal. It does not stop me from buying as it is my very favorite beverage. But sometimes I have to work to drink it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Oxenreiter

customer_reviews.title: Great green tea
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them. She keeps them in stock and takes one to work everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Link Atrius

customer_reviews.title: Moldy
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great deal until I started putting tea in fridge. There is mold on the bottom of each bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Layne83

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a drink that I have never had before. It is just right sweetness-wise. It makes for a nice change of pace from drinking just plain tea or just plain lemonade.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very addictive
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor mix. Love the short ingredients list& the price is good too. Much better than unhealthy soda pops.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Bonus case of Honest Tea!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea and to be able to buy a case is Bonus!! My local stores are often out of it so I love the convenience that Amazon offers for shipment!!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: It tasted ok, but not what I expected to. I did however, taste a little honey in it. presentation was awesome; just need to put a little bit more honey in it
customer_reviews.author: JEANNIE S.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bottled green tea on the market. I am glad it is sold in a pack. Not too sweet, perfectly balanced. $18.50 for a 12 pack is a fairly good value, that's $1.54 for one bottle. If I forget to take one with me when I'm out of the house one bottle can cost me as high as $2.50 (NYC prices for you).
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: love this tea
customer_reviews.text: This tea is smooth, not too sweet and only 70 cal per serving. If you like green tea ice tea, I would encourage you to try this tea. The price is the best I have found anywhere also.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kidney

customer_reviews.title: no tea or honey flavor
customer_reviews.text: Received today as expected: ...Both my wife and I agree about the lack of flavor... very disappointing.,
customer_reviews.author: c armugwump

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy This Tea!
customer_reviews.text: I hated it! The flavour was bitter, and left a lot to be desired. I don’t know why I can buy Arizona Green Tea In my local grocery store with my EBT card, but on Amazon, I cannot. I don’t even know who I might be able to give it to!
customer_reviews.author: Heismyjoysong

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tea, i havent had one case that wasn't consistent. Price is a little high to enjoy too often.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Honest Tea
customer_reviews.text: I love green tea and honey but there is no flavor in this product! There is sediment in the bottom of bottle and the tea color is very light. This is not Honest Tea, it is too expensive!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Willis

customer_reviews.title: A Bad Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering 12 packs of the Honest Tea organic Honey Green Tea for over a year. This was the first time that one of the bottles had what looked like was mold on the bottom of the bottle. I shook it up thinking it was tea leaves and tasted it. It was TERRIBLE and spit it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting drink & it's Sweetness is just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste Not too sweet just right! I purchased these several times already. The drink is very satisfying for breakfast and snacktime. My only problem is it's difficulty to open,well sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in our house loves this, especially in the summer. I buy a case every month using the automatic Amazon Subscribe and Save feature. Update: I continue to buy this with Subscribe n Save. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Anne D

customer_reviews.title: Lemon and regular tea
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because it was best value. The flavor is good if you like lemon. Over time it grew on me so i really like it now :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it because it tastes bad
customer_reviews.text: How can half tea/half lemonade taste bad? I have no idea but they definitely accomplished it. I couldn’t take more than a sip without wanting to spit it out. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fair

customer_reviews.title: Great tea, not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Product was excellent... Shipped and arrived late, arrived with some popped and leaked out in the box. However the tea itself is great, wonderful taste. I would buy it again if the shipping problems are addressed, tea is a little expensive and to have multiple ones damaged/lost due to problems with the packaging and handling-- that sucks. Really mild flavor and not overly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Toothsquatch

customer_reviews.title: best for lunch
customer_reviews.text: They say green tea is good for you so I have a glass every day at lunch and find it to be most satisfying with just a hint of sweetness which is what I prefer as most green teas are too sweet for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Tallahatchie tom

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing berries
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good flavor and not too sweet and really hits the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea & Lemonade
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tasting Arnold Palmer, made with unsweetened tea and lemonade, making it half as sweet as some, but sweet enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If the other review remains i love this tea. It's all i drink. So i go through a lot. Right now im rather agitated at the purchase limits placed on this item. More information should be provided regarding limits and if and when they renew.
customer_reviews.author: KraftE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love Honest Tea Half and Half. This is a good price for them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting tea
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite drinks. Not too sweet and very affordable on Amazon. I buy a few cases a month.
customer_reviews.author: TRP89

product_meta.title: Honest Tea Organic Fair Trade Honey Green Gluten Free, 16.9 Fl. Oz, 12 Pack
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Honey GreenExperience the difference of real-brewed iced tea with Honest Tea organic bottled teas . Add a refreshing hint of organic honey with brewed organic green tea leaves to your day with Honest Tea Honey Green Tea. Committed to the highest standards of quality, Honest Tea organic teas are sourced from only the finest tea leaves and organic ingredients from around the globe. All of the Honest Tea organic iced tea beverages are real-brewed with Fair Trade Certified tea leaves, gluten-free, OU-Kosher certified, non-GMO, and free of high-fructose corn syrup. No GMOs means that if there is a bioengineered version of an ingredient, we don’t use it. This organic honey green tea ships as a pack of 12 16.9-fluid ounce recyclable plastic bottles.
feature_bullets: Add a refreshing hint of organic honey and brewed organic green tea leaves to your day with Honest Tea Honey Green Tea
Committed to the highest standards of quality, Honest Tea organic teas are sourced from only the finest tea leaves and organic ingredients from around the globe

All Honest Tea organic iced tea beverages are real-brewed with Fair Trade Certified tea leaves, gluten-free, OU-Kosher certified, and non-GMO. No GMOs means that if there is a bioengineered version of an ingredient, we don’t use it
This organic honey green tea ships as a pack of 12 16.9-fluid ounce recyclable plastic bottles
Real-brewed, organic green tea made with Fair Trade Certified green tea leaves and cane sugar with a touch of honey
USDA organic and contains no GMOs
All teas are real-brewed with Fair Trade Certified tea leaves and cane sugar whenever used
Honey Green Tea tastes Just A Tad Sweet and has 70 calories per 16.9 oz. bottle

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
